myMath

Class Polynom

  • java.lang.Object
    • myMath.Polynom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    cont_function, function, Polynom_able

    public class Polynom
extends java.lang.Object
implements Polynom_able
    This class represents a Polynom with add, multiply functionality, it also should support the following: 1. Riemann's Integral: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Riemann_integral 2. Finding a numerical value between two values (currently support root only f(x)=0). 3. Derivative
    Author:
    Bar Genish, elyashiv deri

      • root

        public double root(double x0,
                   double x1,
                   double eps)
        The root function finds a root value of a polynom while given 2 values that 1 is positive and the other negative and eps which will make sure that we are eps close to the 0.
        Specified by:
        root in interface Polynom_able
        Parameters:
        x0 - should be the lower value of the x's provided
        x1 - should be the higher value of the x's provided
        eps - is the threshold value to check if the x value is close to the correct answer
        Returns:
        real number that represent the distance of our x-Axis to the X axis of an apsilon deviation

      • area

        public double area(double x0,
                   double x1,
                   double eps)
        Compute Riemann's Integral over this Polynom starting from x0, till x1 using eps size steps, see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Riemann_integral
        Specified by:
        area in interface cont_function
        Specified by:
        area in interface Polynom_able
        Parameters:
        x0 - starting pooint
        x1 - end point
        eps - positive step value
        Returns:
        the approximated area above the x-axis below this Polynom and between the [x0,x1] range.
